function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of ethanol in the fabrication process","Impact":"Potential health risks due to exposure to ethanol fumes","Mitigation":"Ensure proper ventilation and use of personal protective equipment","Technologies":"Fume hoods, respirators","People":"Workers, fabricators, and anyone in the vicinity of the fabrication area","Owner":"Employer, safety officers"},{"Description":"Exposure to argon plasma during cleaning process","Impact":"Risk of skin and respiratory irritation from exposure to plasma","Mitigation":"Provide training on safe handling of plasma cleaning, use protective clothing and equipment","Technologies":"Personal protective equipment, training programs","People":"Workers involved in the cleaning process","Owner":"Employer, safety officers"},{"Description":"Testing for SARS-CoV-2 inactivation","Impact":"Potential exposure to SARS-CoV-2 during testing","Mitigation":"Use of appropriate containment measures and biosafety protocols","Technologies":"Biocontainment equipment, biosafety cabinets","People":"Laboratory personnel, researchers conducting the testing","Owner":"Laboratory management, biosafety officers"}]}
